.. index:: BalancedPAdicRational

.. _l42616c616e6365645041646963526174696f6e616c:

BalancedPAdicRational p
=======================

:viewcode:`padic.spad line 559 <padic.spad#L559>` :editcode:`[edit on github] <padic.spad#L559>`

* p: \ :ref:`Integer <l496e7465676572>`\ 


Stream-based implementation of \ ``Qp:``\  numbers are represented as sum(\ ``i``\  = \ ``k``\ .., a[\ ``i``\ ] * p^i), where the a[\ ``i``\ ] lie in -(\ ``p``\  - 1)\ ``/2``\ , ..., (\ ``p``\  - 1)\ ``/2``\ .


.. _l42616c616e6365645041646963526174696f6e616c-30:

  from \ :ref:`AbelianMonoid <l4162656c69616e4d6f6e6f6964>`\
